subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Over his first four months, Masahiro Tanaka has set a standard of excellence, but, sooner or later, there was bound to be a game in which he struggled, and it came against the Indians on Tuesday.
snippet: Over his first four months, Masahiro Tanaka has set a standard of excellence, but, sooner or later, there was bound to be a game in which he struggled, and it came against the Indians on Tuesday.
